attributes.action: change the law to causing death by drinking and driving to murder.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By changing the law from dangerous driving to murder should mean that fewer people would be tempted to drink and drive.  If you get behind the wheel whilst over the drink driving limit and cause a death, then you should be tried for murder.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
